dict.acceptation: 结果，成果；[逻]结论；重要性；推论；

sent.orig: This new outlet came as a consequence of the development of a future town.
sent.trans: 这个新的排泄口是产生于规划中的未来一个城市。

sent.orig: From these simple claims follow bizarre consequence that challenge common sense our perception of reality.
sent.trans: 由这简单的结论得出奇怪的推论，挑战了对现实的日常感知。

sent.orig: This material inversion excites irregular, and as a consequence passionate, concern.
sent.trans: 物质的倒转引起不正常，结果是激情的关心。

sent.orig: The energy conservation law is a consequence of the shift symmetry of time.
sent.trans: 能量守恒定律是时间的对称性改变的结果。

sent.orig: Let us elaborate a significant consequence of this fact.
sent.trans: 让我们仔细推敲一下这个事实的一个重要结果。
